reviewText:
Love this yoga class! It helped me feel more like myself, eased tension and helped me feel more relaxed.
Its great to be able to do yoga in the privacy of my own home and whenever I want. Very gentle and encouraging flow style yoga.

This is a very ordinary practice with nothing unique for those nearing menopause.  I would have liked to see a practice of restorative poses to help deal with the stresses and physical changes of that time of life.  There are a few stretches, which are not held long enough; otherwise it's mostly Sun Salutations.
